title: Our children's Occupational Therapists (OT's) are celebrating OT Week by sharing how proud they are ...

attachments.displayName:
Our children's Occupational Therapists (OT's) are celebrating OT Week by sharing how proud they are to do their job #proud2bOT

Why do you love being an OT?

I am so proud to be part of a team that listens to children and works with their dreams.

I am so proud to see children face their adversities and triumph in spite of them.

I'm proud to be able to provide equipment that gives support to help children's development & skills.

object.content:

actor.displayName: East Kent Hospitals University NHS Foundation Trust
